content: If i can give them zero stars I will. They a rip off we have to pay service and fees, pay the delivery fee plus tip the driver thats crazy and thats why they drivers dont get tip much and the coupons are only for first timers which is dumb

Waited 2 hours for my food it was not delivered and no sorry. Im trying it one more time im hungry and i work hard risking my life to live and i get little enjoyment out of life. And i cant even get a reason why it was canceled. That very bad to make the people that pay your bills and put food on your table. No respect.

Horrible experience ! There orders ALWAYS come late, fiest experience with grubhub my order came 20 min late even though i orderd 2 hours ahead of time. just now they canceled my meal 5 min before i was suppose to leave for lunch... not only that the restaurant called me about the incident and told me that they still picked up my order but somehow still got canceld.. guess someone got to eat for free.
Try to order 5 dollar coffee... go to checkout. $2 delivery fee, $2 service fee, $2 small order fee... oh an dont forget the tip. Canceled order.
App keeps crashing 1 min or less after launching. Tried reinstall. Same issue.
Crashes and doesnt load

DOOR DASH!!!!!!!!......Should have been the experience! My primary order was from Red Robin, no one ever picked the delivery order up. So I had to call the help line for that, then I was credited $20 which the order was $21.10 and I was refunded within 3 to 5 business days the additional $1.10. So my new order was from McDonald's a Double Quarter Pounder Combo (Large) with extra Bacon, slivered onion, mayo, and lettuce. In addition to that ordered 2 McFlurries which I did not receive. 4 hr order
Consistently late and I've had multiple orders cancelled without a reason provided.
If I could give it 0 stars I would they suck at customer service their driver's are RUDE they have bad attitudes and they leave your food anywhere for anyone to get it HORRIBLE

They sneakily got rid of the $10 back for every $100 you spend with the GH+ membership without telling anyone and added fees that didn'tused to be there. Not worth using anymore, just call the restaurants directly.

Useless. Can't update the current address/location to see options nearby. Insists on showing me options from our old apartment even though I'm allegedly searching for restaurants at my new home nearly 30 miles away, and sorting by "distance."
Price manipulation. EVERYTHING is marked up and some of it is by 30%+ even with a subscription. It's marked up more than Doordash. This service is a scam just like DD.
The app gives me offer codes, I try to use the offer code for my order, then the offer code expires. The app gets you to the final order screen and then flips you the finger.
They refused to cancel an order that had been delayed twice, a place that is 7 minutes away by car was going to take over 2 HOURS. I asked them to cancel after waiting an hour and they said no.
Multiple occasions of orders just not showing up at all, then being told Grubhub won't issue a refund.
They credit $5 on an $80 meal completely cold and side dish wrong, are they serious?! uoo
tried to force me to take substitute. i told driver to cacel .driver cheat n get substitute to get paid so they try to for u to buy.messed up my whole dinnee
I ordered a delivery and after 1.5 hours I had to go pick it up myself. I wrote a review and asked for a refund but never received an answer. Deleted the app and staying away from it.
App locks up all the time. Restaurants short me food all the time and they don't refund my money.

After more experience with the app, my opinion has done a 180. Most restaurants will forget your food. Drivers will steal your food and never arrive. Grubhub support is largely unhelpful and will disconnect mid-chat. Don't bother with this app, just drive to the place yourself or use another service.

You can schedule a delivery several hours in advance and it will still somehow run late. They almost double the cost of food with fees yet when something goes wrong with the order it's always the driver's or restaurant's fault and they want nothing to do with it. If they are going to charge so much for their "service" then they should also be involved in resolving issues with the service.
Payment methods keep getting overwritten and only work after 5 or 6 times entering them. The app is janky.

Service is always down. Can't even reliably place orders when you can't checkout. Menus are also way over price compared to the location's actual menu and GH still has the nerve to charge a service fee. Just call the restaurant directly and pickup. Stop supporting these awful people like them, Doordash, Uber Eats, etc.
Deleting . Tired of not getting the correct order.
Worst custumer service. I ordered using grubhub my ordrr never arrived and they did not refund me.

They led me to believe an order would go through, then canceled it and gave me a $10 off coupon then canceled the order I used that coupon on... not ordering from them ever again. Doordash has better selection and customer service

Worst app. Tried multiple times ordering from a restaurant that I'm sitting in the middle of the drive-thru for and will not make a delivery. Customer service will not help eithier. Good luck getting your food!

I sign up for grubhub plus and it tells me I get a 10 dollar credit... ...that I can only use on pickup? why am I using your delivery service then? I can just go to the restaurant and order it. I feel scammed not going to lie.

Smh. After calling 6x with a complaint. I'm doing using this app. When the company I n unreliable and drivers aren't held responsible for not following procedures. Tf would i want to pay either for? Perfect example why I've stopped tipping. Tired of wasting my money on even those that can't even sit on their asses and to do that right.

Im uninstalling, its literal trash, processed order then the app instantly cancelled it and said something was wrong, charged my card $41 anyway then when i try to reorder it says something went wrong, it wontt let me delete items from my cart. Do yourselves a favor and delete your app from the store. And i better get my money back

Absolutely horrible app and service. Signed up with the year free through Amazon prime. Every order I have made I go through the process of customizing my order and what I want on my food/what I want in general and every time I get to checkout, it orders and then it says "we ran into a problem" or something similar and results in a pending charge on my bank account and a canceled order EVERY TIME. This is not only frustrating but a waste of money and time. Do not use this app! I warned you. :-(
Food is never on time, prices are insane. I'd rather just go there myself at this point.
Terrible account security and awful customer service. At least my bank caught the fraud charges uSS,Ac,oAOe
Worst customer service. I've eats way better
too much feee e en with promo 28 dollar becomes 50 dollar
Used to be a good app until they got rid of map view. Will uninstall and use Postmates instead.
Does not give refund for cancellation of memberships.

There is a very good reason why I switched to using Doordash. If I didn't have a gift card I would have never gone back. Orders NEVER arrive on time. I waited 2 hrs 4 food after being assured if I canceled my original order & ordered at a new place that it wouldn't be delayed, but it was. Customer service is a joke. Doordash would have given me credits, not a discount. Took 3 tries with customer service for them to actually look into the issue which was a lack of drivers. App is hard to navigate
offered a $10 code for first order for a restaurant and the code wouldn't work. Also, the same restaurant offered fries as a side option and Grubhub doesn't list it as an option.
App never works right. It never shows any restaurants for delivery whenever its supposed to

Used before with no problem, but today the true incompetence of the ppl who made the up comes out. Don't recommend using the app, it's just spining for the last 30 minutes and won't let me get my food. Someone cut some corners, and it won't work no matter what I try. Don't install.

After a few orders, I have come to the conclusion that I cannot trust Grubhub or its drivers with my orders. Twice in a row I have left the special request "Do not ring the doorbell."with the driver ringing it anyway, either due to incompetence, illiteracy or outright idiocy. This causes problems for me and disturbs the other household residents. I originally turned to Grubhub as a hopeful alternative after having been burned by DoorDash, but I guess I still have to look elsewhere.
My debit was hacked 700. Dollars.
Terrible experience. 3 drivers, and 2.5 hours later the food was picked up.

Worst experience ever! First of all. Im in a hospital with my son who just had major surgery and all he wanted was a subway sandwich. So i placed my order. When it arrived i wasnt contacted and the driver must have dropped it off somewhere else. So i walked a couple of blocks looking for where it was delivered. I didn't find it. So i chatted w some guy named Jorge who by the way was very inconsiderate. Im not from around here. Like i said im in a hospital. So i ordered again.
Over priced and depending on location where drivers say they will pick up but don't, still charged for product not recieved, horrible customer service. User beware.
extra fees are absolutely ridiculous. I only use them when I have no way to pick up food
Hate their commercials

They raise the prices!! With Amazon we got an offer of free delivery, so I thought it's a great deal. When I started ordering my favorites I noticed that the price was higher than it would usually be in person! I'm not talking about handling fees or anything but the price for the dish itself could be anywhere from $3 to $5 HIGHER. I don't even know if the restaurant gets the extra tip or Grubhub itself.
Can't even create account
App is completely broken
No matter what address I put in it says there is nothing nearby.
Grubhub doesn't seem to work at all. At least not in Maryland
half the time orders get cancelled because the restaurants are actually closed. or because grubhub declined their drivers' cards for no reason
Grub hub is the worst food delivery app available. I have never gotten my food on time and their customer service is terrible. I will be uninstalling and sticking with door dash.
The app never works. I got a 10 dollar compensation code that I can't even use because the app is still unable to process anything uSSss Very disappointed

Drives stole my food and then when I asked if I could just have them send me a new order I was told no that they would refund me and I could order again, but the refund would take 5 business days to come in.
This app is ridiculous! They charged me for something I never even requested and now I have to wait on an EMAIL!! NOT GOOD CUSTOMER SERVICE/SUPPORT AT ALL!!uSS"uSS"
They lie. Are robots. The app doesn't pick up promotions. Never again.
Don't ask me for a rating
Positive reviews are bought. "Undefined reason your order can't be placed." Seriously, use any other app.
Grubhub does not credit your account if you don't get your food. How ridiculous is that!
Have had so so many problems with delivery and my orders being delayed

Delivery is never available. It constantly tells me the restaurant is closed and that delivery will open at 7pm. I've only been able to order from my favorite pizza place twice in 5 months?!?!?! Terrible company/service.
App keeps crashing plus really service charge is a rip of aswell as delivery fee doesn't make you want to tip the delivery driver I know i won't be tipping anymore
Several drivers have just neglected to pick up our order without notice. Maybe a better veering process for drivers is needed.

So i have used this app for so long but the last 2 times a drive has either dropped my food and my food was disgusting and the last time my food was stolen by one of the drivers at 10 at night and i got no food and all they said was here is you're money back like what check you're divers.
because the app would leave me alone until I'll give you One Star

Nothing i do works. Search,order,sign in,fails so try to sign in again, fails. Enter code you are sent. Fails. Way too frustrating ...and what i wanted was to order food..... Tho the completely empty, nothing can be ordered blank slate probably doesn't help. Order from door dash-this site doesn't know or care what WY is.

First order....Outrageously high service fee, plus, delivery fee, plus tip, made my order $25 more, it was missing items. Hard to find customer service info to explain issue. Then I'm told they cant have the driver pick up the missing item, all they can do is issue a partial refund for the item that you wont receive for up to 5 business days. So I'm out the food and the money for 5 days. What's worse, the food was for my kids..... I think they were more upset than me. My advice.... Use Doordash!
Used app twice and both were a disappointment. They deliver cold food or none at all.
Way too expensive, I feel like I'm being raped when I use it.
Doesn't have full menu. they didn't get the time right had to wait over an hr even though the food is done in 15 minutes and my food was cold and wrong
I know restaurants are open and the app says they're closed. Not impressed at all
Usless not in my area
First and last time I will be using this app. I ordered food at 7:34pm just to find out at 9:06pm that my order was cancelled for unknown reasons. Complete waste of time.

Made me wait over an hour just to get the response that my order was canceled. Fix. Your. Stuff. Grub. Hub. Update: Ten minutes after posting this review, I got a call from Grubhub customer support. I was told that my order was still "possible to be delivered," and the person had NO idea it was canceled from their end. No more business from me, ever.
The app keeps canceling my order.

Please be working so anyone can use it without having to make it a goddamn account it's stupid it's real f****** stupid enough to make a mother f****** account this f****** food f*** you stupid mother f******

DO NOT USE THIS APP! free delivery my a!@ lol look at the prices on the restaurants site and then compare it to grubby hubs price. I understand everyone needs to make money but up charging by almost $4 dollars on just one item is just gouging your customers. Will never use this service.
We have issues more often than not. I have deleted this app and will never use them again. Something has gone wrong every single time we have used Grubhub.

FOR YEARS, I have experienced one of the most terrible glitches ever. Everyday I check the app to see if the problem perssists. Every moment of every day the restaurants are closed and unavailable. I MEAN EVERYDAY. I've done every troubleshooting technique i can do but nothing has worked. Customers Service doesn't know how to help I've talked to them several times spanning 4+ years. Also restaurants are allowed to PRICE GOUGE.

Started an order, got a notification for a $10 coupon on that order, applied it, and was told that my order wasn't elligible. Placed the order anyway, then when I arrived at the restuarant for pickup, the app told me they had cancelled the order with no reason given and I was given no prior warning.
Free trial autorenews, and cancelling early cancels your trial immediately. Incredibly scummy.

I have no problem with the eateries I have ordered from or the app. My problem is with Grubhub itself. I ordered on 3 different occasions with about the same results. First order ever, I was quoted an hour. Over 2 hrs later and 2 drivers later, I finally received my food. Second order was also longer than quoted, food was hot and driver was apologetic. Third order was timely delivery, however not one item on my order was correct (restaurant sorted me out themselves). Contact me Grubhub!!!
Doesn't work anymore. Try to order and it tells you "Something went wrong." I suppose that's one way to make sure you don't lose cash on the people who used the Amazon promotion.
Rip you off they want lile 10 for delivery and 10 or more for tip for driver.

I wanted to test something out. So I went on Grubhub and selected a Large Dr.Pepper. 11.23 for a drink? Seriously? However if I use Doordash, I can get two McChickens for 11.86? Overpriced, why would someone pay that much for a drink and on top of that tip the driver? Yeah.....No.

I found out after I got my food and it was wrong that the restaurant is not affiliated with Grubhub. Burger apparently comes with lots of extra toppings and there was no way to modify the burger or remove them. The toppings were not even listed on the page once you selected the burger. Ridiculous.

Used it twice. Both times food was delivered over an 1 hour after the time it was supposed to be delivered. Food was ice cold. Got no refund,no warm food. Drivers can not or will not follow directions, to find my place I live in. It is a 2 turn directions from the main road. Tell them which way to turn,give them the names of the roads every thing. They have delivered to the wrong home both times. 1 a mile short of where they were supposed to delivered. The 2nd one went on by and delivered 5 mile

This app is awful do not use it, a few of the drivers on here are awesome people but one in particular called KE is absolutely horrible and does not deserve a job on this app or any other food delivery app, EVERY time they take my order they take forever to even start going to the restaurant to pick it up even when the order has been ready for 30+ minutes. I've complained multiple times to customer support and they haven't do a thing about it the 4.5 star rating is a lie
Customer service is horrible...save yourself the trouble and use Doordash.
Randomly cancel orders and try to blame it on the restaurant. Not worth the headache.
Worst customer service ever! Had an issue and they did not care. Told it would be escalated and I would be contacted by email. Never got an email from them. What a joke of a company.

Grubhub isn't bad but the food options on the app are not clean and do anything with your food. You guys tax us 15% and make delivery 11% and make people regret ordering and tipping;which isn't fair. I wouldn't use.
I waited 1 hr and 45 minutes for my food for GrubHub to cancel and offer no explanation. All dinner places closed around me in the meantime. Thanks!
Second time I've used them. Both times they messed it up. Never again!

Grubhub will let you place orders when no one is even in the area to pick it up, which turns into cancelling the order and going to pick the food up yourself. They also have restaurants on the app that dont have a contract with them, which turns into waiting 2 hrs, calling the restaurant to find out they never got your order, calling customer service to cancel the order and again, going to pick the food up yourself... oh yea, and by this time it's cold.
They allow drivers to take multiple deliveries at the same time if they are from the same restaurant. This causes my order to be delayed over an hour on 2 separate occasions!
Never again will I use this app. It's horrible & ridiculous.
Now all the sudden I get to review order and no way to check out. Awesome job grub hub!

Trash. I've used grubhub for a long long time. The restaraunts that have drivers are fine but once your order goes to the 3rd party delivery service, you're screwed. 50/50 chance you get your order within 90 mins. Go with an alternative if possible, if not... Good luck

We have now had 4 out of 7 orders cancel on us, for absolutely no reason. I strongly do NOT recommend using this service. You either pay Uber Eats $10.00+ in "service fees" or roll the dice on if GrubHub will actually deliver your food... Save the time. Save the money. Make your own food & stop feeding these corporate CEOs more cash.
They changed the tipping. They always are trying to make this app worse
It suck stole my money never got my food never gor my refunds
Makes a normal meal for 3 cost around $100
Concur with other reviewers. There is no system in place to check poor delivery employees. This ruins the experience when we are already paying way more than one should. Poor service
Bad app nothing right

Worst! The app says driver delivered order but it's not even prepared at restaurant. I don't recommend grubhub. This happened twice in a week and they won't give you an alternative driver. My whole family was hungry and waiting for good to arrive but we starved and I had to drive till the restaurant to get the food. I understand mistakes happen but this was happening on and on. What they do is they cancel the order and refund you but money is not all. Poor service! Disappointed!!
Stop asking me to rate the app
Error! I can't even put in an order from any restaurant with any form of payment. It gives me an error when I submit. It's been like this for a week or so!
Wouldn't take my debit or credit card. Can't use your service I can't pay for food. Doordash and Uber work just fine.
Delivery fee is always going up!!

This service is GARBAGE! Every single time that we use this service we have a problem with the food. They NEVER have replacement food sent to us... The ONLY offer refunds... Which do NOT solve the actual problem. We have given this service one too many tries and we are fed up. They ALWAYS screw up my CHILDRENS' food and then refuse to have food resent... I just don't understand that. Other apps, like door dash, will have the correct food sent in a timely manner. We will keep our money there.

This is by far the worst food delivery company. Good god, I only ever have problems with grubhub delivery, not uber eats, not door dash, just grubhub. Yall suck so bad. Your driver's are the worst, they just cancel orders because they feel like it, the delivery fees are super high, and the customer service is trash. You guys are just worthless all around. Go bankrupt please.
Did not let me check out, repeatedly refreshed page.
your bullcrap promo's suck. Check my account for money I spent! NO MORE FOR YOU
Unavailable in my area.
Tried using the service a couple times, and they cancel the order after a long wait with no explanation. Pizza place told us they did make the order and someone picked it up for delivery too, weird.
Hot garage. The only reason I still use this app is because I live kinda far and this is the only app that will deliver food to me
Terrible app, would not let me use actual promo code when I had qualifying purchase.
Doesn't work in Canada install skipthedishes
Driver customer service is always horrible. Used this service less than 10 times total and had 2 orders canceled because the driver does not understand the concept of customer service.

Does not remove restaurants when they're showing as wildly different locations than reality. Customer Service continually lies to cover themselves. Don't use Grubhub, they will not respect you in the least or take responsibility.
orders take too long just to get picked up & that with having GrubHub plus.
Doesn't match with actual running time of stores
Don't download this it sucks

This app is soo retarded I have tried to order but it won't let and it removed the new payment method just because I went into a new area, any i try to order something it doesn't let, I had better service at doordashuodeguodeguodeg

So far in the in 5 years having our store. This is the worst service we have had. 4 of 5 of our orders do not make it to the customer.we have stopped service for this reason. We give it a negative 5 star for giving our business a bad name for lack of delivery!
Increase your drivers' pay and I'll change my rating.

The last two times I ordered from this app I was very disappointed, the app says it's "order on time" but by the time I get my order my food is cold....I highly recommend not ordering from this app, I rather do just uber eat even though they're alittle more pricey
Awful! A $35 total becomes $52 with all the separate fees they charge. Ridiculous. I'd rather go through drive thru myself. Pathetic charges.

It says restaurants are closed when they are open, it does not inform you when food is ready, and does not update with new items. I have used this app for months and more than once it says it thinks I am a robot and has me fill out captchas for a half an hour before I give up. Terrible app.

My order was canceled by grubhub so I got an email for a free 60 days. Followed the link and signed up. Got charged for grubhub+. Talked to customer service and they won't refund or give me the 60 days.
Doesn't deliver to my workplace

I downloaded this app and ordered food, but they didnt deliver. They said my food was ready to be picked up, which didnt make sense because I downloaded the app for delivery. They said they would refund my money, but I havemt gotten a refund yet.
Stop asking me to rate you
ordered food and the restaurant was closed
Predatory company offering restaurants that don't want to be listed, and harming small business. Call restaurants directly instead of funnelling profits to this large corporation.
Worst app ever! Wont allow me to change my order, doesnt delete my previous orders. Save some time and just go to the drive thru yourself!

If not the app it's the people that they serve Captain D's food was disgusting and I just want you to know it's because they don't let you get into contact with them once they feed you this blank blank food I wouldn't feed it to my dogs
Cancels orders unexpectedly; overpriced fees; LONG delivery times.
Tried it in Florida. Food was never delivered had hotel security look and he was never there. If they can't deliver they get to keep your food. So paid $44 worth of food and never received a refund.
Drivers bring me only half my order

Be very careful, when ordering in one time zone for food to be delivered in another. I ordered for a friend in a different time zone and GrubHub converted the time without asking me or telling me. The food was wasted. No refund issued for their apps poor user interface. Customer service was a joke. Blamed me. I will update if anyone reaches out to me, if not assume they didn't and won't help you either.

The UI is awful and the delivery prices are high. I've never managed to get the app to actually recognize any promotion code or discount. It also routinely sends drivers the WRONG address, even though it shows ME the correct one when placing the delivery. Don't use this app.
Said my food was delivered. It never was. I had a very difficult time getting any customer service.

This app is absolute trash. Almost like a scam app. It will send 6ou fake offers we which you can never apply. This is also refused to take pre paid credit cards. Just a bunch of trash. I do not recommend it.
orders constantly getting cancelled
Ordered food waited over an hour! Trying a different food service...
Says I dont Have a Grub hub plus account but Im being charged for a monthly membership! THEIVES! Its been charging my card for MONTHS!

They say you can get a free year when you link your prime account. But every time I try to link, it tells me password is incorrect, although I'm already logged in using the same credentials. So I contact customer service and none of them can help. I try to reset the password and none of the 10 codes that were sent will work to verify so I can change the password in order to link the accounts. So I figure it's a scam to just get you to pay an extra $15 in fees and just order the food. NOPE
Where is Chick-fil-A ????
The small order fee is ridiculous.

Waste of time, tried to make a new account to do the endwalker promo and they kept cancelling order. Went to customer service to see why all they would say is we can get back to you in 3 days and would not offer any assistance and even said can't order anything for at least 3 days. All this trouble I'll just drive down and get it myself
The actual worst delivery app that exists.

Ordered for the first time today. Order stated 30 minutes delivery time. It later updated to 1 hr and then it updated to 2 hrs and then 3 hrs.. I ordered panda. Come on! Im unistalling this app do not waste your time and money.
TERRIBLE company. Every experience I have ever had ordering through this app has turned into a nightmare.

okay first of all we can talk about how much they charge in delivery fees and all their other fees and how much they jack the prices of the food up on their app versus at the store. Yes I know that all food apps charge more for the food but this one charges the most for food and fees. and then the driver doesn't update you doesn't knock on the door doesn't text you just leaves your food sitting on the front porch and it gets cold. Once my gift card amount is gone I'll never use them again.
This rating is because of your awful commercial...just awful
Doesn't deliver in my area

consistently late or error-ridden orders, indifferent customer service. truly dreadful experience compared to all the other food delivery apps. most recently, they cancelled my order more than an hour after it was placed, and said it wasn't their fault because the restaurant was supposed to deliver it, not them. And, I have their "GrubHub Plus" service. I'd recommend you use the other delivery apps if you can!

Delivery delayed over an hour so you contact their CS to get a refund and they tell you they can't because the restaurant already made the order (I guess an hour prior?). Just make sure you pay with a credit card so you can dispute the charges with them, debit cards you can't do that. And if anyone was curious I did leave a tip on the order at the recommended amount from GH.
Service fees are ridiculous
Does not deliver to my area.

I had multiple terrible experiences with your app and with your company. Worst delivery app I've tried. Wasted so much money on cold undercooked food, incorrect orders, and an incompetent delivery crew. Thanks for nothing. uoi App keeps getting worse. And the drivers are EVEN WORSE!
Did not receive order. They said it was delivered.
fees are crazy, food prices are higher on ap versus store so you end up paying 40% more UT seems like. fees have gotten out of hand

Never using again. Waited 2 hours on my taco bell, only to have it not be at my doorstep. They "refunded" me but kept $6. How does that work? Their driver probably having a free dinner and $6 tip right now.
I've ordered through you 5 times in the past 7 nights on the road and twice you never delivered, once you brought the wrong order. Im done using GH now. Bye!!!!
There's never anyone available in my area to deliver

Stick with doordash, they have better offers lower delivery rates and better discounts. GrubHub is a joke, my cousin had bone fragments in his food and they refused a refund. I'm not stopping at this review I'm going public about this. If you value good food don't go through GrubHub cuz they don't care about you or the value of your food!
Way too much mark up on price, a $40 order on the restaurant site is a $65 order on GrubHub
why does Grubhub make it so hard to change the address you want to search for food near?
I ordered my food and originally it said 20-30min. Then they said it was delayed for another 10 min. Well one whole hour later they finally showed up. I will be sticking with Door dash from now on.

I left a 1 star review describing how horrible this app is and they DELETED IT. GrubHub does NOT show you how many miles you are traveling for deliveries, doesn't even let you zoom into the map, you could easily accept a 10 mile order for $7. A total scam. And the hardest app to use out of all of them.

Trash service.. I was forced to use it for a gift certificate from work.. first order was cancelled ten minutes before it was due after being ordered several hours ahead of time. Second order I sat and watched the driver, drive around not picking up the order for nearly an hour after the order went in. Never again terrible.
Bad who wants to wait an HR for food u can pick up down the street defeats the whole purpose and I've had a bunch of orders canceled after an HR don't use this app
he deliver to wrong address

Way too many issues, wish I could give 0 stars!! No drivers to pick up orders yet there's a waiting list to become a driver? Took fighting tooth and nail to get a refund from them for an order that never had a driver. This last issue was the last straw. Absolutely DONE! UNISTALLING!

Ordered lunch to be delivered at my job between 1215-1230 to align with my lunch break. 1155 I received a text from the driver stating he was here but i did not see the message until 1202 when he began repeatedly calling me over and over. So I replied I'm sorry I'm on my way out. Upon meeting him, he immediately harassed me for not being quicker, wasting his time, losing him money etc despite him arriving 20 minutes early from the time I set in app. App has No rating/review system for drivers!!
Worst app ever. Continues to be inconsistent and driver repeatedly don't show up. I have used this app 4 times I total and never had an order been 100 percent correct
fees are too high, especially when they never get orders right, drivers dont check food before leaving restaurant or follow direction

Im very disappointed that after two hours of waiting for a couple appetizers I just get an apology via text. I will be uninstalling the app and leaving a negative review. Also I have to wait three to five business days for my refund. Meal should have been on the house. Someone should have claimed responsibility and purchased my meal for free.

If this is common in our area, the service should not be available. When I filed a complaint, they offered me $5. I had to come back and ask for my fees and 20% tip to be refunded. Awful.

A family member and I busted *ss getting 100% of the orders and we got pulled over by a cop. I tried to contact them multiple times what was going on, but there's no way to do it without getting on a phone call with "support". We end up missing the order and actually got a text saying that we missed it and any more can result in termination. It also doesn't help that they'll send you for taco bell on the opposite side of town, removed the order, not pay a penny, and expect you to drive back.

My food was delivered 20 minutes late with half of the order missing. when I tried to find a way to contact GrubHub to fix the problem, it was very difficult to figure out how to do that. They only refunded me for the missing items. I did not get refunded for my delivery fee even though I then had to go pick up my own food, or for the tip that they had me pay in advance. Will not be using GrubHub again. I'm switching over to Postmates, hopefully that will be better.

Awful. Either you won't get the food you ordered or they wont even deliver. They give you coupons but when you, food won't arrive. Don't every try to order ahead cause 90% of the time, your food is super late. I only get an hour lunch and by the time food arrives, it'll be too late.

Today, however, my wife wanted Dunkin Donuts. So she sent me her grubhub order and I thought I'd give it one more chance. 3) Dunkin Donuts - we ordered 1/2 dozen donuts, 2 breakfast sandwiches, and a coollatta drink. Basically a $40 order after all the fees. We get the delivery and it's just the drink (which tastes like piss water). A $3 drink. Grubhub refunds me for the missing items again, but that still leaves the $5 tip, the $5 delivery fee, and the taxes on a $40 order. We paid ~$15 for a flavored water. I uninstalled GrubHub and will not be using it again. Their customer service is garbage and their system seems to always mess up my order. This service sucks as a meal deliver service. You'll do better to use one of the other two popular ones. My latest experience with GH - I order several entrees from a nice Italian restaurant, even though they weren't GH+ (meaning I had to pay more for fees, etc). Get the food - the order is totally wrong with just a passing resemblance of what I ordered. To confuse things even more, the receipt with the order matched the food, but was less than 50% accurate to the order I could see I made on my phone. So I call the restaurant to see what happened. The person who answered the phone knew who I was and knew about the order. She explained to me that the order was phoned in by someone with "a very strong accent". She had a difficult time understanding the person. The name of the pizza I ordered was a "Shawnza". He couldn't convey this in a way that the person taking the order could understand and told her to "just skip it". Then on other items when she tried to clarify (and interpreted what he said poorly, he told her, "that's ok" even though it didn't match what was ordered. The restaurant person conveyed that it didn't appear that he was even looking at the restaurants menu and didn't know what the meal options were. So I get ahold of Grubhub on chat (the only way I could see to reach them) and explained the problem and what their part was in the problem. They offered to not charge me for the missing items. So big of them. I told them, "If that's what I wanted, I could have done that online via the order. This was supposed to be a nice meal and it's ruined - I want you to refund my order." (My monthly quota for being a 'Karen'). He checked with his supervisor who told him, "no". Even though they refunded 1/2 the order, they only refunded 2 dollars of the fees. The fees and driver tip ended up being 10 dollars more than the food price. I won't be ordering from GrubHub again, and thought others should know that this high-tech service isn't very high-tech and doesn't care about getting your order wrong.

The service has become a complete joke. I've had Grubhub and Seamless for over 10 years and used to love both. Ever since they merged and the logos and apps became identical the service disintegrated and the prices keep rising. The common promotions slowly disappeared and when they do come they appear via push service only. If you don't immediately order or take a screenshot of the code it disappears for good. Here's the best part: the offer says $5 off a $10+ order, for example, but when you try to order the minimum is actually $30. This happened to me two days in a row. Other times, the code simply didn't work, no reason given. If you have the patience to argue back and forth with Grubhub (which can only be done via Twitter now) you'll eventually miss the delivery window anyway. Their service reps on Twitter are trained to act clueless and helpless. So your choices are overpriced food or no food at all. Do yourself a favor, delete both apps and order from your local businesses instead. They deserve your money far more.

Grubhub has really gone downhill since the pandemic started. I recently ordered from a local chain restaurant that had a banner that stated I would get free delivery for orders over $15.00, which would have the delivery fee removed during checkout. Went through checkout only to be charged the delivery fee. I chatted with Grubhub and they stated, after I had to send them a screenshot of their own website showing the promotion, that they would refund me the delivery fee of $4.99. Turns out they refunded me $4.59 and applicable tax, which comes out to $4.97. Fine, whatever, close enough. Next, on the same order, I was to have the order delivered by 7:45 pm that night. I watched how my order was accepted by a driver at 6:54 pm. I then got to watch the driver go near the restaurant, not get my order, drive to three separate stops, and then by 8:45 she finally gets to the restaurant and I receive my cold, hardened food by 9:00 pm. I attempt to go back into the app to reach out to Grubhub again, but once you get one measly service request fulfilled, you're screwed on receiving any future service. So, I call and reach their "customer service", which was just a kid saying, "Sometimes order times change". Yes, I agree, but when I can literally watch the driver bypass the restaurant three times only to finally go get the food once I text message her, to which she says "it'll be five minutes," which really meant it took an hour, maybe the customer is correct that something went awry with your app? Overall, when I eventually got my food, the chicken was hard, cold, and congealed. But sure, maybe the restaurant waited until the driver got there to make the food and it just hardened within 15 minutes. What did I do to attempt to make this right? I was able to reach a chat agent again by going to another previous order, pressing the get help button, and then putting the order number into that chat. That's the workaround to their crappy app. Anyway, after explaining to them what had occurred the night before they said, "Here's a 20% coupon for your next order". I was then asked, "Do you want to receive your food or just get a refund." I wanted some sort of reconciliation, but, alas, that would have been too much for the 18 year old attempting to hand out customer service for a billion dollar company. Thanks for not listening to my request for some small refund, but whatever I took it because that led me up to tonight, 7/10/20. I used that 20% coupon on a local Mexican restaurant. I ordered 5 hours ahead to make sure there were no issues. Well, of course there was an issue. Did you know when you order 3 rolled tacos from Roberto's Taco Shop on any other app or in person they ask you what type of meat you would like in it? Grubhub's app does not, so I was informed I would just get 3 fried tortillas covered in guacamole. YUM!!! That sounds... well, dumb. Why would you call it a rolled taco in the app without any option to choose a choice of meat? Anyway, the driver gave impeccable service and had them remake my 3 orders of 3 rolled tacos. But guess what!?!?! The restaurant straight up didn't give me any of them. Fortunately, requesting a refund through the help option was easy without any questions asked. Overall, Grubhub is a junk delivery service now. There is active listening by any of the customer service reps; they only listed to respond, not to assist. Their app also lacks basic services such as picking meats that are supposed to go into items or restaurant promotions that are supposed to be added immediately, such as free delivery or a buy one get one free option. Use any other delivery service instead as you will find Grubhub is more of a nuisance than a well-rounded paid-for service.

The App is not free due to hidden fees. 1 fee, which is $3.99 for grubhub to offer a delivery service for the app, it's not for the driver delivering your food. The 2nd fee is for grubhub to cover operating cost for grubhub which is $5.99 per order. A total of $9.98 per order you spend to use this app. So it's not free. When you order using this app, you are participating in unfair business practices. GH charges delivery fees but only pays the driver 30-50 cents/mile.
